languages.text: {n}Космодесантник Хаоса словно и не замечает вас — его взгляд обращен к пастве, ловящей каждое его слово.{/n} "Живущие во лжи не узреют Истины, пока не отринут фальшивых богов. Лишь вашей верой преисполняется власть этих трупных червей, пожирающих самое ваше тело, язвящих слабые души, изъедающих глаза и уши, дабы не обратили вы их к подлинным владыкам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хаос-десантник словно и не замечает вас — его взгляд обращен к пастве, ловящей каждое его слово.{/n} "Живущие во лжи не узреют Истины, пока не отринут фальшивых богов. Лишь вашей верой преисполняется власть этих трупных червей, пожирающих самое ваше тело, язвящих слабые души, изъедающих глаза и уши, дабы не обратили вы их к подлинным владыкам".

languages.text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine does not seem to notice you — his gaze is focused on his flock, who are hanging on his every word.{/n} "Those living a lie will not see the Truth until they have renounced the false gods. Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that devour your very body, wrecking weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them toward the true masters."
languages.original_text: {n}Космодесантник Хаоса словно и не замечает вас — его взгляд обращен к пастве, ловящей каждое его слово.{/n} "Живущие во лжи не узреют Истины, пока не отринут фальшивых богов. Лишь вашей верой преисполняется власть этих трупных червей, пожирающих самое ваше тело, язвящих слабые души, изъедающих глаза и уши, дабы не обратили вы их к подлинным владыкам".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Chaos Marine doesn't seem to notice you — his gaze is focused on the flock hanging on his every word.{/n} "Those living a lie will not see the Truth until they have renounced the fake gods. Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that are devouring your very body, wounding weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them to the true masters."

Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that are devouring your very body, wounding weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them to the true masters."

Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that devour your very body, wrecking weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them toward the true masters."

languages.text: {n}这位混沌星际战士似乎并没有留意到你。他的目光正集中在他的牧群上，而他的牧群正在认认真真地聆听他说的每个字。{/n}“那些生活在谎言之中的人们，除非能摒弃他们的伪神，否则将注定无法看到真理。那些尸虫会扭曲你们的信仰，因为只有这样，他们才能维持他们的统治。他们会吞噬你的躯体，摧毁孱弱的灵魂，蚕食你们眼睛与耳朵，让你们无法认清你们真正的主人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine does not seem to notice you — his gaze is focused on his flock, who are hanging on his every word.{/n} "Those living a lie will not see the Truth until they have renounced the false gods. Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that devour your very body, wrecking weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them toward the true masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}这位混沌星际战士似乎并没有留意到你。他的目光正集中在他的牧群上，而他的牧群正在认认真真地聆听他说的每个字。{/n}“那些生活在谎言之中的人们，除非能摒弃他们的伪神，否则将注定无法看到真理。那些尸虫会扭曲你们的信仰，因为只有这样，他们才能维持他们的统治。他们会吞噬你的躯体，摧毁孱弱的灵魂，蚕食你们眼睛与耳朵，让你们无法认清你们真正的主人。”

languages.text: {n}El Marine Espacial del Caos no parece percatarse de tu presencia; su mirada está fijada en su rebaño, que interioriza cada una de sus palabras.{/n}«Aquellos que viven en la mentira no verán la Verdad hasta que hayan renunciado a los falsos dioses. Solo a través de vuestra fe se mantiene el reinado de los gusanos cadavéricos, gusanos que devoran vuestros cuerpos, despojando las almas más débiles, carcomiendo vuestros ojos y oídos para que no los giréis hacia los verdaderos maestros».
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine does not seem to notice you — his gaze is focused on his flock, who are hanging on his every word.{/n} "Those living a lie will not see the Truth until they have renounced the false gods. Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that devour your very body, wrecking weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them toward the true masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Marine Espacial del Caos no parece percatarse de tu presencia; su mirada está fijada en su rebaño, que interioriza cada una de sus palabras.{/n}«Aquellos que viven en la mentira no verán la Verdad hasta que hayan renunciado a los falsos dioses. Solo a través de vuestra fe se mantiene el reinado de los gusanos cadavéricos, gusanos que devoran vuestros cuerpos, despojando las almas más débiles, carcomiendo vuestros ojos y oídos para que no los giréis hacia los verdaderos maestros».

languages.text: {n}ケイオス・スペースマリーンはこちらに目もくれない。その視線は、ソレの言葉ひとつひとつを今か今かと待つ群衆に注がれていた。{/n}「嘘に生きる者達は、偽の神を捨てないかぎり真実を見ることはできない。汝らの忠誠心を介して初めて、その虫ケラの死骸は支配権を握る。汝らの体を虫ケラが貪り食い、弱き魂を壊し、目と耳をかじって真の主を見れないようにする」
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine does not seem to notice you — his gaze is focused on his flock, who are hanging on his every word.{/n} "Those living a lie will not see the Truth until they have renounced the false gods. Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that devour your very body, wrecking weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them toward the true masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}ケイオス・スペースマリーンはこちらに目もくれない。その視線は、ソレの言葉ひとつひとつを今か今かと待つ群衆に注がれていた。{/n}「嘘に生きる者達は、偽の神を捨てないかぎり真実を見ることはできない。汝らの忠誠心を介して初めて、その虫ケラの死骸は支配権を握る。汝らの体を虫ケラが貪り食い、弱き魂を壊し、目と耳をかじって真の主を見れないようにする」

languages.text: {n}Der Chaos Space Marine scheint dich nicht zu bemerken – sein Blick fixiert seine Herde, die gebannt an seinen Lippen hängt.{/n} "Wer eine Lüge lebt, wird die Wahrheit erst sehen, wenn er seinen falschen Göttern abgeschworen hat. Nur durch Euren Glauben hat die Herrschaft dieser Leichenwürmer Bestand, die Euren Körper fressen, schwache Seelen vernichten und an Euren Augen und Ohren kauen, damit Ihr sie nicht auf die wahren Meister zuführt."
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine does not seem to notice you — his gaze is focused on his flock, who are hanging on his every word.{/n} "Those living a lie will not see the Truth until they have renounced the false gods. Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that devour your very body, wrecking weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them toward the true masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Chaos Space Marine scheint dich nicht zu bemerken – sein Blick fixiert seine Herde, die gebannt an seinen Lippen hängt.{/n} "Wer eine Lüge lebt, wird die Wahrheit erst sehen, wenn er seinen falschen Göttern abgeschworen hat. Nur durch Euren Glauben hat die Herrschaft dieser Leichenwürmer Bestand, die Euren Körper fressen, schwache Seelen vernichten und an Euren Augen und Ohren kauen, damit Ihr sie nicht auf die wahren Meister zuführt."

languages.text: {n}Le Space Marine du Chaos ne semble pas remarquer votre présence... Son regard est fixé sur son troupeau qui boit la moindre de ses paroles.{/n} « Ceux qui vivent dans le mensonge ne pourront voir la Vérité avant d'avoir renoncé aux faux dieux. C'est seulement par votre foi que se maintient l'emprise de ces vers nécrophages, de ces vers qui dévorent vos corps, ruinent vos âmes affaiblies, et rongent vos yeux et vos oreilles afin que vous ne puissiez plus les tourner vers les véritables maîtres. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine does not seem to notice you — his gaze is focused on his flock, who are hanging on his every word.{/n} "Those living a lie will not see the Truth until they have renounced the false gods. Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that devour your very body, wrecking weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them toward the true masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Space Marine du Chaos ne semble pas remarquer votre présence... Son regard est fixé sur son troupeau qui boit la moindre de ses paroles.{/n} « Ceux qui vivent dans le mensonge ne pourront voir la Vérité avant d'avoir renoncé aux faux dieux. C'est seulement par votre foi que se maintient l'emprise de ces vers nécrophages, de ces vers qui dévorent vos corps, ruinent vos âmes affaiblies, et rongent vos yeux et vos oreilles afin que vous ne puissiez plus les tourner vers les véritables maîtres. »

languages.text: {n}Kaosçu Uzay Piyadesi seni fark etmemiş gibi görünüyor. Bakışları, her kelimesini havada kapan güruha odaklı.{/n} "Yalanı yaşayanlar, sahte tanrılardan vazgeçene kadar Hakikat'i göremez. Vücudunuzu yiyip bitiren, ruhlarınızı zayıflatan, gözlerinizi ve kulaklarınızı gerçek efendilere çeviremeyin diye kemiren ölü tufeylilerin saltanatı, yalnızca inancınız sayesinde devam ediyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The Chaos Space Marine does not seem to notice you — his gaze is focused on his flock, who are hanging on his every word.{/n} "Those living a lie will not see the Truth until they have renounced the false gods. Only through your faith does the reign of those corpse worms hold, worms that devour your very body, wrecking weak souls, gnawing at your eyes and ears so that you do not turn them toward the true masters."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kaosçu Uzay Piyadesi seni fark etmemiş gibi görünüyor. Bakışları, her kelimesini havada kapan güruha odaklı.{/n} "Yalanı yaşayanlar, sahte tanrılardan vazgeçene kadar Hakikat'i göremez. O vücudunuzu yiyip bitiren, ruhlarınızı zayıflatan, gözlerinizi ve kulaklarınızı gerçek efendilere çeviremeyin diye kemiren ölü tufeylilerin saltanatı; yalnızca inancınız sayesinde devam ediyor."
